long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check what version of Nukeviet a web page is powered by.
Nukeviet Version Check determines if web pages are powered by Nukeviet, what version they are running, and indicates if the version in use is outdated.
There are links to info-sites ( mainly SEO-oriented ) pointing to the exact page about the site you are watching.
